name: Whirligig
description:
Do you ever need help making decisions? Well Whirligig can help! Whirligig is a customizable spinning selector. Just give it a question and some possible answers then give Whirligig a spin to reveal your destiny.

Whirligig is completely random and unbiased.
It saves your questions so you can easily ask them again.
Add or remove available answers at any time.
Add up to 1000 answers to choose from.
Change the duration of the Whirligig's spin.
